alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Fairfield and south central New Haven Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stratford, or near Milford, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, New Haven, Milford, Shelton, Fairfield, Stratford, Trumbull, Branford, Monroe, Orange, West Haven, East Haven, Easton and Woodmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven
